thread.title: Are High-School Esports the Next Friday Night Lights?

author: Sarah E. Needleman
title: Are High-School Esports the Next Friday Night Lights?

organizations.name: national federation of state high school associations

text:
Make room in high-school trophy cases for videogame squads.
A top adviser for U.S. high-school athletics and activities has recommended schools adopt esports programs to go along with football, baseball, debate and other traditional after-school pursuits. 

It is the National Federation of State High School Associationsâ€™ first recommendation... RELATED VIDEO Esports and the Rise of the Digital Athlete Esports are beginning to look a lot like real sports. Go inside this explosive industry and take a look at why future Olympians might compete from behind a keyboard. Photo: Steve Strait for The Wall Street Journal
